rdf:Description.dc:title: Van ’t Viooltje dat weten wilde
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Maria Catherina Metz-Koning (1864–1926)
Simon Moulijn (1866–1948)
rdf:Description.dc:rights: Public Domain. Publication Date: 1900 (this edition 1913). This work was originally published with the author’s name spelled Marie Marx-Koning.
